long_description: Engineered specifically for triathlon competition, this Serfas saddle is equal to the demands of the high-performance athlete. Designed for women, with a slightly wider back and shorter nose than a men's or unisex saddle, to better accommodate female pelvic bones. Protective side bumpers aid setup and transition. Extra-long nose with gel insert increases cyclist's ability to locate the ideal comfort zone; nose is extra wide for added comfort. Extra-long rails extend fore and aft adjustability. Features a leather cover and hollow titanium rails.
short_description: Engineered specifically for triathlon competition, this Serfas saddle is equal to the demands of the high-performance athlete.
